text: Are there any other sports for which they offer an API for the scores? I am thinking football although the accuracy of their football scores is quite poor at times. Never knew about this API. Makes you wonder what else they have hidden away.

text: Yes, betfairlightweight has football scores through the undocumented in play service: <https://github.com/liampauling/betfair/blob/master/betfairlightweight/endpoints/inplayservice.py>

text: <@UU56FEF50> has joined the channel
hey all, I notice _async has been removed in the recent update.. Is there a way to not have the streamer go into a seperate process so I can debug?

elements.text: hey all, I notice _async has been removed in the recent update.. Is there a way to not have the streamer go into a seperate process so I can debug?

text: You can still debut separate threads

elements.text: You can still debut separate threads

text: how do you do that?

text: Pycharm can do it but tbh I don’t understand the problem as the only change has been now you need to create the thread

elements.text: Pycharm can do it but tbh I don’t understand the problem as the only change has been now you need to create the thread
